messages.content: i need you to act as a professional human translator, native speaker in English Italian . As a professional human translator, you don't translate word by word, but you focus on making the translation fluently readable. Aiming for a smooth and engaging flow of ideas. Making sure to maintain the original meaning and context of the original text.

I understand. In order to provide a high quality translation, I use my knowledge of the English and Italian languages to ensure that the text is translated in a way that is both accurate and natural-sounding. I also take into consideration the cultural and regional nuances of the languages in order to provide a translation that is both meaningful and appropriate for the context.

the following is a business email, translate it in idiomatic italian with a formal tone: Hello xxx,
I am xxx, project manager of Bonjour Brand. I am contacting you to see if you would be interested in bringing your creative vision to the new Chinese market.
Based in Paris, we are a Chinese-French communication agency. Since its foundation, we have successfully initiated and accompanied more than 200 projects, linking European designers/artists with Chinese brands.
If you are interested in joining us, please contact me by return of this e-mail! I am at your disposal for discussions about the possibilities of our future collaborations. If you have a little more time, I invite you to first create an account on our Bonjour ID community platform. You will also find more information about us there: www.bonjourid.com (The English version will be available soon!)
 
Find us on social networks:

I look forward to hearing from you and wish you a nice day! 
Warm regards
